description: Custom image analyzer for KB article images (diagrams, screenshots, charts, photos, etc.)

Description.description: A detailed description of the image suitable for search indexing. The image may be an architecture diagram, flowchart, network topology, conceptual illustration, photograph, or a software UI screenshot. Describe what the image shows, including key concepts, components, relationships, data flows, or annotations visible. Do NOT assume the image is a screenshot unless it clearly shows a software user interface.

UIElements.description: List of key UI elements visible ONLY if the image is a software UI screenshot (buttons, menus, fields, labels). If the image is a diagram, chart, photo, or any non-UI image, return an empty array.

NavigationPath.description: The navigation path shown in the image ONLY if it is a software UI screenshot, e.g. 'Settings > Security > Manage user security'. If the image is not a UI screenshot, return an empty string.
